mapper.select:
SELECT u.* FROM SYS_DATA_ELEMENT u
ELEMENT_CODE like concat(concat('%',#{queryString}),'%') or ELEMENT_NAME like concat(concat('%',#{queryString}),'%') or PY_CODE like concat(concat('%',#{queryString}),'%') or WB_CODE like concat(concat('%',#{queryString}),'%')
SELECT u.* FROM SYS_DATA_ELEMENT u where stop_flag = '0'
mapper.insert: insert into SYS_DATA_ELEMENT (ELEMENT_ID,DATA_VERSION,GMT_CREATE,GMT_MODIFY, HOSPITAL_ID,ELEMENT_CODE, ELEMENT_IDENTIFICATION,ELEMENT_NAME,ELEMENT_REMARK, ELEMENT_DATA_TYPE,ELEMENT_FORMAT,ELEMENT_STANDARD_ID, ELEMENT_PD_ID,ELEMENT_BD_ID,ELEMENT_FD_ID, ELEMENT_DATA_TYPE_ID,STOP_FLAG,PY_CODE, WB_CODE,INPUT_FLAG,MULTIPLE_FLAG, MAX_VALUE,MIN_VALUE,INTERVAL_VALUE, FORMAT_DATA_VALUE,ELEMENT_TYPE,DICT_ID ) values ( #{elementId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{dataVersion},#{createTime},#{modifyTime}, #{hospitalId},#{elementCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{elementIdentification,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{elementName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{elementRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{elementDataType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{elementFormat,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{elementStandardId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{elementPdId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{elementBdId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{elementFdId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{elementDataTypeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{stopFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{pyCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{wbCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{inputFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{mulitpleFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{maxValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{minValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{intervalValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{formatDataValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{elementType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{dictId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.update: update SYS_DATA_ELEMENT set GMT_MODIFY = #{modifyTime}, ELEMENT_IDENTIFICATION = #{elementIdentification,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ELEMENT_NAME = #{elementName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ELEMENT_REMARK = #{elementRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ELEMENT_DATA_TYPE = #{elementDataType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ELEMENT_FORMAT = #{elementFormat,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ELEMENT_STANDARD_ID = #{elementStandardId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ELEMENT_PD_ID = #{elementPdId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ELEMENT_BD_ID = #{elementBdId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ELEMENT_FD_ID = #{elementFdId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ELEMENT_DATA_TYPE_ID = #{elementDataTypeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STOP_FLAG = #{stopFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PY_CODE = #{pyCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WB_CODE = #{wbCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, INPUT_FLAG = #{inputFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MULTIPLE_FLAG = #{mulitpleFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MAX_VALUE = #{maxValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MIN_VALUE = #{minValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, INTERVAL_VALUE = #{intervalValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FORMAT_DATA_VALUE = #{formatDataValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ELEMENT_TYPE = #{elementType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DICT_ID = #{dictId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ELEMENT_ID = #{elementId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select PARENT_ID from SYS_DATA_ELEMENT_DICTIONARY where ELEMENT_ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select count(*) from SYS_DATA_ELEMENT_DICTIONARY where ELEMENT_ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select ELEMENT_NAME from SYS_DATA_ELEMENT where ELEMENT_ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
